column2: Question
Summarize Paytm’s latest quarterly performance and key drivers.
Provide a 3-year historical financial trend for Paytm.
Break down Paytm’s business segments and their contribution to revenue & profitability.
Provide a competitive landscape vs PhonePe, BharatPe & Google Pay.
Extract all regulatory events affecting Paytm since 2022.
Summarize all Paytm investor calls since 2022 into a single management commentary tracker.
What triggered the major stock price movements (>5%) in the last 12 months?
Provide TPV and lending distribution trends for the last 8 quarters.
What is Paytm’s merchant network growth trend?
Provide a timeline of product launches since 2022.
Extract all SEBI filings related to ESOP/insider trading.
Give a breakdown of Paytm’s cost structure.
Provide a detailed analysis of Paytm Payments Bank (PPBL) related issues & its financial impact.
Provide Paytm’s valuation multiples vs global fintech peers.
Extract cash flow trends & working capital analysis.
Provide a full SWOT analysis of Paytm.
Provide the list of all subsidiaries & their financial performance.
Summarize key risks highlighted by management in filings.
Provide Paytm's customer acquisition cost and lifetime value estimates (if disclosed).
Provide analyst consensus expectations vs actual results for last 4 quarters.
Extract all litigation & contingent liability updates.
What is the status of Paytm’s partnerships (banks, NBFCs)?
Provide insights on the distribution of Paytm’s loan book.
Provide YoY profitability bridge (Contribution Profit → EBITDA → PAT).
Give a detailed capital structure & liquidity position.
Create Paytm’s operating metrics dashboard.
Provide major board & management changes since 2022.
Give a summary of all shareholding changes (promoter, FPI, mutual fund).
Provide Paytm's stated medium-term guidance.
Build a base-case, bull-case & bear-case scenario for the next 3 years.
Summarize Paytm’s latest quarterly results (revenue, contribution profit, EBITDA, PAT).
Provide YoY and QoQ growth across revenue and key profitability metrics for last 8 quarters.
Break down revenue by business segments (payments, financial services, commerce, cloud, devices).
Provide a 3-year historical P&L (revenue → EBITDA → PAT) consolidated.
Provide contribution margin (payments-only) historical trend and drivers.
Provide TPV (Total Payment Volume) trends for payments—last 8 quarters.
Give lending distribution (disbursements) trends and partner breakdown.
Provide merchant network growth (count, devices deployed, ARPU).
Provide active user metrics (MAU/DAU/registered) and engagement trends.
Provide product launch timeline since 2022 with business impact assessment.
Extract all regulatory events affecting Paytm since 2022 (RBI/SEBI/others).
Summarize the Paytm Payments Bank (PPBL) restrictions/status and quantified impact.
Provide an 8-quarter bridge from contribution profit → EBITDA → PAT.
Give Paytm’s capital structure & liquidity position (cash, borrowings, undrawn lines).
Provide cash flow trends (operating, investing, financing) last 5 years.
Provide working capital analysis and operating cycle dynamics.
List and summarise material litigation & contingent liabilities.
Provide shareholding pattern changes (promoter, FPI, MF) over last 8 quarters.
Extract ESOP grants, outstanding, and potential dilution schedule.
Provide a timeline of board & senior management changes since 2022.
Provide analyst consensus vs reported results for the last 4 quarters and surprises.
Build base/bull/bear financial scenarios for next 3 years (revenue, EBITDA, key assumptions).
Provide valuation multiples vs Indian & global fintech peers (P/S, EV/Rev).
Provide a competitor comparison: PhonePe, Google Pay, BharatPe on KPIs (TPV, merchants, revenue).
Identify causes of all >5% single-day stock moves in last 12 months.
Provide share issuance / buyback / capital raising history since IPO.
Provide detailed breakdown of operating costs (personnel, marketing, processing, tech).
Provide unit economics for device (point-of-sale) business: cost, margin, payback.
Provide unit economics for payments business: take-rate, direct costs, contribution per TPV.
Provide unit economics for lending distribution: commission per loan, effective margin.
List all subsidiaries & associates with short description and last reported financials.
Provide disclosures on related-party transactions & quantification.
Provide analyst/credit downgrades or regulatory fines and quantification.
Extract and summarise all Earnings Presentations since 2022 (themes & changes).
Provide a risk matrix (probability & impact) for top 10 risks.
Provide Paytm’s policy/approach on data privacy & security (disclosed).
Provide a reconciliation of reported KPIs vs statutory numbers (e.g., Contribution profit definition vs GAAP).
Provide a timeline of material press controversies and management responses.
Provide a table of large customers/merchant concentration (if disclosed).
Provide geographical revenue distribution (if disclosed).
Provide detailed description and financials of any NBFC/Bank partnerships.
Provide audit qualifications, if any, and auditor commentary over time.
Provide loan book asset-quality proxies (if direct book not disclosed).
Provide all SEC/overseas filings (if any) or cross-border exposures.
Provide a historical cost of revenue / gross margin analysis.
Provide a customer acquisition cost (CAC) and LTV analysis (if disclosed or inferable).
Provide a summary of corporate governance disclosures and board committee composition.
Provide ESG or sustainability disclosures and any KPIs reported.
Provide a list and assessment of strategic M&A / investments since 2022.
Provide merchant take-up & economics for value-added services (loans, insurance).
Provide breakdown of marketing spend and ROI where possible.
Provide data on promotional/discount spend and its impact on take-rate.
Provide investor sentiment summary (news tone & social media trends since 2022).
Provide list of material tax issues or disputes and quantification.
Provide an overview of technology stack/disaster recovery disclosures (if any).
Provide a cross-check of KPI definitions used across filings (consistency check).
Provide a timeline and financial summary of any government/central programs Paytm participates in.
Provide a reconciliation of disclosures between IR site and exchange filings (spot-check 10 items).
Provide broker/analyst note excerpts on key turning points (if in DB).
Provide an assessment of concentration risk in payments processing (vendor/rails).
Provide KPIs for customer retention & churn (cohort analysis if available).
Provide a summary of any product/platform outages and remediation steps.
Provide a detailed competitor pricing & merchant discounting comparison.
Provide an analysis of marketing / sales channel efficiency across offline/online.
Provide a historical timeline of strategic guidance given by management and actual vs guided outcomes.
Provide list of proprietary indexes or third-party datasets the platform used in its analysis.
Provide mapping of which exchange filing / slide supports each key assertion in the platform’s report.
Provide quantitative sensitivity & scenario tables for key variables (TPV, take-rate, marketing spend).
Provide a summarized “what management said” tracker across all earnings calls since 2022.
Provide a reconciliation of investor concerns raised in media vs management replies.
Provide an independence check on platform’s calculation (recompute 10 KPIs from raw filings).
Provide well-sourced footnotes for every material number used in a draft report.
Provide an executive summary suitable for a sell-side research note (600–900 words).
Provide a reproducible checklist for verifying any claim made by the platform (QA steps).
Produce a final “report-ready” pack: tables, charts, slide-ready visuals and an assumptions appendix.
Chart Paytm’s quarterly revenue trend since FY22.
Chart Paytm’s contribution margin % by quarter since FY22.
Plot Paytm’s EBITDA (reported & adjusted) over the last 12 quarters.
Chart monthly/quarterly GMV across Paytm Payments Bank & Paytm Payments Services.
Visualize Paytm’s merchant base growth over time.
Chart Paytm’s loan distribution (merchant loans, personal loans, Postpaid) over last 10 quarters.
Plot Paytm’s device deployment growth: Soundbox + card machines.
Chart Paytm’s payment processing revenue vs. cost of processing over last 12 quarters.
Visualize user engagement: MTU (monthly transacting users) since FY22.
Chart Paytm’s payments net take-rate over time.
Show trend of Paytm Postpaid active users and outstanding loan book.
Chart Paytm’s UPI market share versus PhonePe, Google Pay.
Visualize merchant discount rate (MDR)-related revenue by quarter.
Plot marketing expense as % of revenues over the last 12 quarters.
Chart employee cost trend including ESOP expenses.
Visualize Paytm’s cash & cash equivalents trend.
Chart Paytm Payments Bank metrics — deposits, wallet balances, FASTag issuance.
Plot Paytm’s NPA trend across loan products.
Visualize break-up of Paytm’s revenue into Payments, Financial Services, Commerce.
Chart monthly share price & volume of Paytm since 2022.
Plot Paytm’s market cap vs. revenue (valuation trend).
Chart analyst consensus targets vs. actual stock performance.
Visualize key regulatory events (timelines) alongside revenue/GMV.
Chart Paytm’s net take-rate split by merchant category (offline vs online).
Visualize the impact of Paytm Payments Bank restrictions on metrics (MTU, GMV, deposits).
Plot Paytm’s operational profitability timeline (CM positive → EBITDA positive → PAT).
Chart Paytm’s post-paid loan origination vs repayments.
Visualize Paytm’s advertising and promotional expenses over time.
Chart cash burn vs cash runway.
Plot Paytm’s UPI incentives (if disclosed) vs costs.
Chart fintech sector comparison: Paytm vs PB Fintech vs Nykaa vs Zomato (revenues/EBITDA).
Visualize Paytm’s customer acquisition cost trend.
Plot Paytm’s Soundbox revenues vs merchant subscription revenues.
Visualize Paytm’s monthly UPI payouts/incentives.
Plot churn rate of merchants (if disclosed or estimable).
